Posts.Content: Aug 15, 2010 10:08AM ladym13 wrote: Hi Lilylou, Was your chemo TCH? How long after chemo did you start seeing any growth, it's been 6 weeks for me and I am only noticing hair on my legs, not my head...sniff :(
Posts.Title: when will my hair come back? ladym13 ladym13

Posts.Content: ladym13 wrote: Hi All, I finished chemo on June 30th was doing TCH and am continuing with the herceptin for a year going every 3 weeks. My Onco told me my hair would start coming back after my last chemo and there is still no sign..I'm freaking out a little. Just wondering how fast the hair should return, would love to have some feedback I'm wondering if there will be no growth until the herceptin is finished. Please someone...anyone give me some advice... :) Mo 37 years old- Left side Mastectomy, Chemo and rads completed in 2010, Unilateral DIEP June 14th, 2011, stage 2 Dec 2011, nipple recon March 2013 Dx 3/5/2010, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IIIB, Grade 2, 7/16 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: when will my hair come back? ladym13 ladym13

Posts.Content: Aug 4, 2010 09:00AM ladym13 wrote: Hi V, Thanks for the reassurrance :) Are you still doing herceptin on it's own?
Posts.Title: when will my hair come back? ladym13 ladym13

Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2010 11:43AM ladym13 wrote: Carrol2 I remember being exactly where you are...It was day 14 and I still had my hair and no signs of it coming out, could even tug on it and it was fine, I was CONVINCED I was the exception and that it wouldn't come out...then about day 16 I was driving with the windows open and put my hand through my hair and hair started flying away...It was so hard..so I went and got it cut really really short and thank god I did because a couple days later it was all out. It's so hard, but it DOES come back, It was really hard for me, even though I had a wig and scarves and the whole shebang, it still broke my heart....but I'm happy to report that I have almost an inch now and it's growing in even and nice just as it was before. You'll be okay, but remember it's okay to be pissed once it does finally come out. I'll be thinking of you :) Mo

Posts.Content: ladym13 wrote: Just wondering if there are any fellow canadians out there that have had surgery and treatment at Credit Valley hospital in mississauga. I am awaiting my surgery date to have partial Mastectomy followed by radiation and chemo, just curious to see if there are others also at that hospital and if the experiences are good or bad. Mo 37 years old- Left side Mastectomy, Chemo and rads completed in 2010, Unilateral DIEP June 14th, 2011, stage 2 Dec 2011, nipple recon March 2013 Dx 3/5/2010, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IIIB, Grade 2, 7/16 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
